channel.title: RFID on less on sec
channel.description: Recent content in RFID on less on sec

item.title: Cloning RFID tags for fun and profit
item.description: RFID tags are a technology commonly used but not limited to industrial purposes. These systems are in fact used every day as public transport passes, as security token in access control systems or as a digital “bar code” in shops. Given the diffusion these tags have, it’s important to understand how they work and the security implication of their use. Radio-frequency identification (RFID) uses electromagnetic fields to automatically identify and track tags attached to objects.
